torch.description: A flickering torch mounted on the wall, casting dancing shadows

atmosphere.setting: A damp stone chamber deep beneath forgotten ruins
atmosphere.ambience: The air is thick with the smell of ancient dust and dampness. Water drips somewhere in the darkness beyond your torch's reach.

events: Turn 1: The DM has prepared this dungeon for brave adventurers
lore: This chamber appears to be part of an ancient underground complex, long abandoned and forgotten by the world above.
